p.b: What if the endpoint becomes infected by a threat?

conbody.p: Do one of the following to remove the threat on the endpoint:

li.p: Start a manual scan on the endpoint.
For more information, see Manual Scan Commands section in .
Access the TXOne Central Console console and send a scan command to start malware scanning on the endpoint.

p.b: Where can I get more help with TXOne ?

conbody.p: To get the most up-to-date information and support, refer to .
